REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0859 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-DEF 03-02 0093

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET DEFICIT FORECAST AT 800 MLN STG
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it forecast a shortage of around 800 mln stg in the money market today. Among the main factors affecting liquidity, bills maturing in official hands and the take-up of treasury bills will drain some 1.61 billion stg. Partly offsetting this outflow, exchequer transactions and a fall in note circulation will add around 425 mln stg and 360 mln stg respectively. In addition, bankers' balances above target will add some 20 mln stg to the system today. REUTER
